title: Case studies 1: projects mean people
brief_description: SUMMARY: Uses three case studies to show the reactions of people affected by the introduction of major computer systems. looks in turn at Koch Light Laboratories, the Kingston upon Hull County Borough Council’s vaccination and immunisation scheme and the
